author: @gben82
text: Did anyone here watch the new South Park making fun of the Oculus Rift? Maybe he's in the Rift when he did this vid and didn't even know it. ;)

author: @Rawd123
text: Good review.   The DK1 did do head tracking, but it did not do motion tracking in space.   I'm looking forward to my DK2 showing up!   You should check out Assetto Corsa racing, which has DK2 support.
